description: Erection of 2m high security fencing and gate; CCTV installation, and formation of hard paving and playground (Listed Building Consent application ref: P060267 also submitted)
site_name: St Mary'S And St Stephen'S Church
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: Prior to the commencement of the development hereby approved, the Yew Tree planted in 2000 which is currently adjacent to the front eastern boundary will be replanted in a position to be agreed in writing by the Planning Authority and thereafter maintained.  If the tree should die within 5 years of the completion of the development it shall be replaced to the satisfaction of the Local Planning Authority with the same species or an approved alternative. 

REASON:  To ensure that a satisfactory standard of visual amenity is provided and maintained and to comply with Policy Env 6 of Islington's Unitary Development Plan, 2002.
